data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting (1. Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On December 31, 2021)
data.news_body: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2021

data.caption: Results - September 30, 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today have approved, Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 11, 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today, has considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter Ended On June 30, 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on Thursday, August 12, 2021, has considered and approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter ended on June 30, 2021

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on Thursday, August 12, 2021, has, inter alia, considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter ended on June 30, 2021

data.caption: Results - March 31, 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today i.e. on Friday, June 4, 2021, has considered and approved the Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and financial year ended on March 31, 2021.
